about: My expertise in automation and data validation frameworks enables me to deliver scalable solutions and ensure seamless user experiences. Using agile methodologies and advanced tools, I help optimize performance, increase productivity, and reduce risk throughout the development cycle.

experiences.title: Mobile QA Engineer
experiences.description: I work as a Mobile QA Engineer, focusing on ensuring the quality of our mobile applications. I work side by side with the R&D team, testing our apps on iOS and Android to deliver the best possible experience to users.

experiences.title: QA Engineer
experiences.description: I worked as a QA Engineer, focusing on ensuring the quality of our web applications. I worked side by side with the R&D team, testing our apps to deliver the best possible experience to users.

experiences.title: QA Engineer Jr.
experiences.description: I worked as a QA Analyst, focusing on ensuring the quality of our web applications. I worked side by side with the R&D team, testing our apps to deliver the best possible experience to users.
